General.text:
Type:
Antiarrhythmics
Dosage Forms:IV 1mg/10mL
Common Trade Names: Corvert

Adult_Dosing.text:
Loading dose = 1mg IV in 50mL D5W over 10min (wt>60kg)
Loading dose = 0.01mg/kg IV in 50mL D5W over 10min (wt<60kg)
Dose may be repeated 10min after completion of 1st dose

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: Use in pregnancy may be considered, but data is sparse
Lactation risk
: Not recoemmended
Renal Dosing: none
Hepatic Dosing: none

Indications.text: Rapid conversion of recent-onset A-fib/flutter to NSR

Adverse_Reactions.text:
QT prolongation, V-tach, torsades
Observe for 4hr after infusion

Pharmacology.text:
Half-life: 2-12h
Metabolism: Hepatic
Excretion: Mostly urine
Mechanism of Action: Class III - Prolongs AP and refractory period

Kinetics.text:
Onset of action = 20-30min
Duration of action = 24hr

Onset of action = 20-30min
Duration of action = 24hr
